mapper.select: select a.no as productNo, a.product_category_no as productCategoryNo, a.title as title, a.image as image, a.price as price, a.mileage_add as mileageAdd, a.description as description, a.description_detail as descriptionDetail, a.shipping_price as shippingPrice, a.end_date as endDate, b.isdisplay as isdisplay, b.issell as issell, b.isdisplay_main as isdisplayMain, c.no as imageNo, c.image as imageDetail, c.image_title as imageTitle, c.image_description as imageDescription, d.no as optionNo, d.name as optionName, e.no as optionDetailNo, e.value as optionValue, f.no as quantityNo, f.option_code as optionCode, f.real_quantity as realQuantity, f.available_quantity as availableQuantity from product a join product_manage b on a.product_manage_no=b.no join product_image c on a.no=c.product_no join product_option d on a.no=d.product_no join product_option_detail e on d.no=e.option_no join product_quantity f on a.no=f.product_no where a.no=#{productNo}
mapper.update:
update product set product_manage_no=(select no from product_manage where isdisplay=#{isdisplay} and issell=#{issell} and isdisplay_main=#{isdisplayMain}) where
no=#{no}

update product set product_manage_no=(select no from product_manage where isdisplay=false and issell=false and isdisplay_main=false) where
no=#{no}
mapper.select: select no as categoryNo, name as categoryName, groupno, orderno, depth, parentno from product_category order by groupno, orderno
mapper.insert: insert into product_category values ( default, #{categoryName}, (select ifnull( max(groupno), 0 ) + 1 from product_category a), 1, 1, 0 )

update product_category set orderno = orderno + 1 where groupno = (select * from (select groupno from product_category where no=#{categoryNo}) a) and orderno > (select * from (select orderno from product_category where no=#{categoryNo}) b);
insert into product_category values(default, #{categoryName}, (select * from (select groupno from product_category where no=#{categoryNo}) a), (select * from (select orderno from product_category where no=#{categoryNo}) b)+1, (select * from (select depth from product_category where no=#{categoryNo}) c)+1, #{categoryNo});
mapper.select: select count(*) from product_category where no=#{categoryNo}
